## Is your feature request related to a problem?
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Example: "I'm always frustrated when [...]"

## Describe the solution you'd like
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. If suggesting a new DSL command, please propose the syntax (e.g., \newcommand{args}).

## Describe alternatives you've considered
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Educational/Research Context
How would this feature help in a classroom or research setting? (Optional but helpful).
